Literature.Title: Structure, Function, and Biosynthetic Origin of Octapeptin Antibiotics Active against Extensively Drug-Resistant Gram-Negative Bacteria.
Literature.Author: Velkov T, Gallardo-Godoy A, Swarbrick JD, Blaskovich MAT, Elliott AG, Han M, Thompson PE, Roberts KD, Huang JX, Becker B, Butler MS, Lash LH, Henriques ST, Nation RL, Sivanesan S, Sani MA, Separovic F, Mertens H, Bulach D, Seemann T, Owen J, Li J, Cooper MA

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=2µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa FADDI-PA025(MIC=8µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa FADDI-PA070(MIC=2µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=8µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii FADDI-AB156(MIC=>32µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii FADDI-AB065(MIC=16µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC=4µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae FADDI-KP032(MIC=4µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae FADDI-KP012(MIC=8µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=4µg/ml),Enterobacter cloacae FADDI-EC001(MIC=16µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=32µg/ml)
